effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 842,413 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 311,168.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 358 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 573,283 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
